normalized: confirming the majuu's death, asagi made a call to say the mission was complete.

name: asagi
normalized: …haah…
asagi switched off her phone, then raised her face and breathed a sigh.
however, that was not something which came from the relief of having finished a life-or-death mission.
asagi turned her half-closed eyes towards the shadow of the water tank.

name: asagi
normalized: come out, sakura.
murasaki, too.
asagi called out to it like she was exasperated, and the pitch-black shadow squirmed.
two beautiful girls jumped out from inside it.

name: sakura
normalized: ahahaa～… i knew it.
we got found out, huh?

name: murasaki
normalized: i'm sorry, asagi-sama, th, this is…
they were igawa sakura and yatsu murasaki of the taimanin training school, who were also asagi's students.
sakura, who had literally poked her head out from the shadow of the water tank, made a wry smile as she crawled out from there.
murasaki, on the other hand, had come running up to asagi with great urgency.

name: asagi
normalized: what kind of time do you two think this is?

name: murasaki
normalized: i'm sorry!
she told me asagi-sama had gone out to do something, um, slutty, so i was going to kill her partn… uh, no, i couldn't contain myself, i was concerned, so i came to see the situation―

name: asagi
normalized: “something slutty”…?
sakura!

name: sakura
normalized: uhyaih!
sakura was yelled at by asagi, and she shrank back theatrically, without even a hint of timidity.

name: sakura
normalized: buut～ onee-chan is at fault, since she snuck out.
as her younger sister, it would trouble me if onee-chan had become a delinquent.
sakura haughtily made a show of wagging her finger.

name: asagi
normalized: that's quite a showy look, for putting a stop to your sister's foolish activities.
both of you.
like asagi, both of them were wearing shinobi suits that were made of special materials.
in addition, they were each carrying their respective specialized weapons.

name: murasaki
normalized: th, this is a precaution… it's not like i was going to chop up the guy doing insolent things to asagi-sama… aah, i'm sorry!
for some reason, murasaki's face became bright red as she bowed her head towards asagi.

name: sakura
normalized: well well, so mucchan apologized.

name: murasaki
normalized: sakura, you apologize too!
after all, you told me that nonsense in the first place!

name: sakura
normalized: hey, onee-chan.
your cute little sister and her friend came because we were worried, so let us off!
sakura took out a small hard case, and gave asagi a fleeting glimpse of it.
and then, she lowered her voice so that it would be audible just to asagi.

name: sakura
normalized: it's a good thing it didn't trigger that.

name: asagi
normalized: …haa, good grief.
having noticed the contents of the object in sakura's hand, asagi sighed at her hopeless little sister.
however, a smile had suddenly risen to her lips.

name: asagi
normalized: i'll overlook it this time, you two, but from now on, refrain from acting as you please.
okay?

name: sakura
normalized: yeah, yeah～♪

name: murasaki
normalized: yes, asagi-sama!
sakura gave a light response with a jokey attitude.
murasaki gave a firm reply, her cheeks still getting red for some reason.

name: asagi
normalized: well then, let's go back now.

name: sakura
normalized: onee-chan, let's go out for tea somewhere, then go back!

name: asagi
normalized: no.
anyway, you haven't done your homework, have you?

name: sakura
normalized: ugh, it's too late to do homework now, isn't it?

name: asagi
normalized: murasaki, please stay over tonight.
and save me the trouble of looking after my sister and her bad grades.

name: murasaki
normalized: s, stay…?!
i can stay at asagi-sama's house?!
murasaki opened her eyes wide, and stiffened up on the spot.

name: murasaki
normalized: yes, i'll stay overnight!
with your bad-graded sister, or a monkey, or anything… aah… sleeping together in asagi-sama's bedroom…!
haa haah, i, i'll take care of her!

name: asagi
normalized: …are you all right, murasaki?

name: sakura
normalized: she's the usual muttsuri-chan, so she's fine.
apart from that, onee-chan, how about a late-night snack?
」(tl: muttsuri means uncommunicative or taciturn.

name: asagi
normalized: you'll get fat, sakura.

name: murasaki
normalized: ah, asagi-sama's futon, and pillow, and… haa, even in the b, b-b-bath together…!
having finished the mission, notwithstanding the noisy, cheerful conversation, the three taimanin quietly vanished into the dark of night.
